Text.Value: *Chirp!*
Yes... yes, this is perfect.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: sitting back and admiring what he has made.
EditorData.NodeContext: SAtisfied after making his nest, sitting back and admiring what he has made.

Text.Value: Stop fussing. It looks fine.
Trinkets will rust, friend. A song shines on forever. Give it a try.
ROAR.
No, no - where is it? I put the coin right here.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Bird] look left and right, then hop and checking around (WilsonLee)

Text.Value: Shh, I'm concentrating. Does this look good? Is the coin in the middle?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Bird] hopping around while looking at the nest (WilsonLee)
EditorData.NodeContext: Clearly concentrating on something else while talking to the player. He's pushing the coin around.

Text.Value: Help! Help!

EditorData.NodeContext: Shrill and panicked - being roared at is scary

Text.Value: Leave it out - the metal's bad quality. It'll turn green very quickly.
*The bird hops around, scanning sticks and flowers, looking for a nice addition to his nest.*
No you don't.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] kicks, [Bird] hops backward then aggressive pose
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: the bird picks at the player.
EditorData.NodeContext: The player kicked at the bird, but the bird holds his ground and pecks the foot.

Text.Value: Kick at the bird, trying to scare it away.
Yeah... yeah, you're right. This is better.

EditorData.NodeContext: He just pushed the coin away. He's till a little hesitant, but gaining confidence.

Text.Value: Leave.
Hmm. Hmmmm...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Bird] pushes the coin to the right  - Matt
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: after thinking, he pushes away the coin.
EditorData.NodeContext: The bird is hesitating, thinking long and hard. The player told him to leave out the coin.

Text.Value: Away from the coin, or I'll make a headpiece from your feathers.
Stop it! Help - help!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] kick towards the [Bird] and [Bird] flies up (WilsonLee)
EditorData.NodeContext: The player just kicked the bird.

Text.Value: Ah, umm...

EditorData.NodeContext: The player told the bird to sing, but he's a little shy (though he starts singing after this). He should clear his throat at the end.

Text.Value: *The bird is singing as loudly as his lungs will allow, practising fervently.*
I'm not afraid of you!

EditorData.NodeContext: Defiant despite having been roared at

Text.Value: No... it's leaning too much to the left. Yeah, that's it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Bird] concentrating on coin then use it's beak to move the coin to the right (WilsonLee)
EditorData.NodeContext: the player told him to stop fussing and that it looked fine, which the bird doesn't appreciate.

Text.Value: I'd leave it out - it's too dull.
Don't you dare.

EditorData.NodeContext: The bird is trying to intimidate the player, afraid that the player will steal his coin.

Text.Value: It's slightly off - push it a bit to the right.
Yes... yes, you're right. That's it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Bird] look at [Player] then happily using it beaks pushing coin to the right (WilsonLee)
EditorData.NodeContext: He's found the perfect spot for his coin.

Text.Value: It's not. And you better keep those fingers far away.

EditorData.NodeContext: The player told the bird the coin was dull, but the bird sees through the lie and realises the player wants the coin for himself.

Text.Value: *He lets out a tentative chirp. Gaining confidence, he starts a song, abandoning his nest-building efforts.*

Synopsis: Speak with animals dialogue. A little bird is adding a coin to the shinies in his nest, but he's not confident it's looking good.
